title: Cesar Milan's Pitbull Has Issues and Miss America Worried About Wellness? 9.13.21
itunes:title: Cesar Milan's Pitbull Has Issues and Miss America Worried About Wellness? 9.13.21
description:
In episode 987, Jack and Miles are joined by The Worst Idea of All Time's Guy Montgomery to discuss Cesar Milan's Pitbull catching a lawsuit, Miss America making wellness a priority after 100 years and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Cesar Milan's Pitbull
  2. Miss America Cares About Wellness
  3. LISTEN: Kate Bollinger - Shadows
